activePublishersExplanation1: Count all persons in the congregation who reported at least once in the last 6 months.
activeRegularInformation: Active and Regular are automatically set when then the Congregation Field Service Report is Submitted. They can also be manually adjusted as needed.
addOrEditPublicTalkOutlines: Add or Edit Public Talk Outlines
addOrRemoveLocalPublicSpeakers: Please click Persons to Add or Remove Local Public Speakers
affectAllAppUsers: This will affect all App Users.
affectAllSharedCongregations: This will affect all Shared Congregations.
affectAllSharedPersons: This will affect all Shared Persons.
allAppointedBrothersInYourCongregation: All appointed brothers in your congregation
allAssignmentsAndDutiesByPerson: All Assignments and Duties by Person
allCongregationFieldServiceReportsSubmit: All Congregation Field Service Reports submitted
allFieldServiceGroupsHaveOverseerAssista: All Field Service Groups have an Overseer and Assistant
allPublishersAssignedFieldServiceGroup: All Publishers are assigned to a Field Service Group
allPublishersHaveEmergencyContactInforma: All Publishers have Emergency Contact Information
allPublishersPersonalInformationUpToDate: All Publishers Personal Information up to date
allRequestedSpeakersUnavailableAllReques: All of your Requested Speakers are Unavailable on all of your Requested Dates
alsoRemoveCongregationSharing: Also Remove this Congregation from Sharing?
alsoRemoveFamily: Would you also like to Remove this Family?
appAllUsersDisconnectReconnectCongregati: After changing the Congregation PIN, ALL NW Publisher app users will need to Disconnect then Re-connect to your congregation.
appAllUsersDisconnectReconnectRegionMess: After changing the App Region, ALL NW Publisher app Users will need to select the new Region.
appChangeAppRegionMessage: A Congregation Administrator should Change App Region
appCongregationPINFixMessage2: 2. Type what you remember the Congregation PIN is below, then click Reconnect.
appCongregationPINFixMessage3: 3. Ask another elder to tell you what they see in NW Scheduler under App > Congregation PIN. Then type that PIN below and click Reconnect
appCongregationPINFixMessage44: 4. Click Congregation > Restore Data, and restore only App Settings. Then click Reconnect, or close and re-open NW Scheduler
appCongregationPINFixMessage5: 5. If all of the above fails, Disable App and then re-enable
appCongregationPINFixMessage6: Note: After re-enabling the App, you can click Change PIN and change it back to your previous 8-digit PIN. If you do not do this, all publishers must Disconnect and Reconnect from the app
appCongregationPINReminderMessage1: Please record or write down your Congregation PIN in a secure location.
appCongregationPINReminderMessage2: If you forget your Congregation PIN, all publishers may have to Disconnect and Reconnect to your Congregation.
appDataAutomaticallyRefreshed: There is usually no need to do this. Data is automatically refreshed when you first open NW Scheduler
appDataCouldNotBeImportedCheckMessage: Some App Data could not be Imported. Please check each data individually
appDataWaitingToReceiveMessage1: There is currently App Data waiting to be Received and Imported.
appDataWaitingToReceiveMessage2: You have temporarily been giving User Access to Receive and Import all waiting App Data.
appDataWaitingToReceiveMessage3: Please first Receive and Import all waiting App Data, then you can Change App Region.
appDevicesAutomaticallyRefreshed: There is usually no need to do this. Devices are automatically refreshed when you first open NW Scheduler
appDisableAppAccessMessage1: This person will longer be able to connect to your congregation in NW Publisher.
appErrorPleaseTryAgain: Please check your Internet connection, click Reconnect and try again. Otherwise please close and re-open NW Scheduler and try again. If the problem persists, please click Help
appExperiencedError: Sorry, NW Publisher app experienced an error
appExperiencedErrorStep1: 1. Check the Error Details, which might contain information about how to fix
appExperiencedErrorStep3: 3. Close NW Scheduler, then re-open and try again
appExperiencedErrorStep444: 4. Close NW Scheduler, wait a few hours, then re-open and try again. Sometimes internet servers experience temporary problems
appInternetConnectionErrorHelpLink: Help > NW Publisher app > Common Questions and Problems
applyYourselfToTheFieldMinistry: Apply Yourself to the Field Ministry
appNewCongregationPINWarning: Your Congregation PIN must be secure and unique. It may not contain dates or theocratic numbers.
appNoDataFoundAdministratorMessage: If that does not work, click Send to re-setup your NW Publisher app
appNoDataFoundMessage1: These are 3 ways this can happen:
appNoDataFoundMessage2: 1. A Congregation Administrator in your congregation Disabled NWP App or changed the NWP App Region
appNoDataFoundMessage3: 2. You have not used NWP app for 3 months, and your NWP App data was automatically deleted
appNoDataFoundMessage44: 3. A Congregation Administrator contacted NW Scheduler Support and asked us to reset your NWP App data
appNoDataFoundMessage55: Please select the correct NWP App Region and click Reconnect
appNoDataFoundNonAdministratorMessage: If that does not work, please contact a Congregation Administrator for assistance. They may need to re-setup the NW Publisher app.
appNotDoneOftenMessage: This should NOT be done often. If you often have to do this, please click Help or Contact Us.
appProcessReceivedAppDataErrors: There were some errors Receiving App Data. Please check the 'App Logs - Received'.
appRefreshPersonMessage: You should only do this if this Person is having App data problems.
appRememberSendAppData: Please remember to Send App Data, otherwise no data will appear on the App.
appRemovePersonInformationMessage: This persons personal data will be removed from the App Server, including from the Publishers list, but except for their name on schedules.
appResetDevicesMessage: You should only do this if this Person is having problems with App Notifications, or App Notifications keep failing for this person.
appResetPINMessage: You should only do this if this Person cannot connect with their App PIN.
approvedAssignmentsAndDutiesByPerson: Approved Assignments and Duties by Person
appUnableToDecryptMessage: This data cannot be imported and must be deleted. The publisher should try to resend this data. If that doesnt work, they must Disconnect then Reconnect to your congregation, then re-send this data.
appWrongPINMessage1: These are several ways this can happen:
appWrongPINMessage2: 1. A Congregation Administrator in your congregation clicked Disable NWP App, then re-enabled the NWP App. This creates a new Congregation PIN
appWrongPINMessage3: 2. A Congregation in your congregation clicked Change PIN
appWrongPINMessage4: 3. A Congregation in your congregation Imported a congregation into NWS Desktop, which overwrites your Congregation PIN
appWrongPINMessage5: 4. A Congregation in your congregation Restored a Congregation or NWP App Settings from Backup
areYouAbsolutelySure: Are you ABSOLUTELY SURE you want to do this?
areYouCongregationAdministratorAndElder: Are you a Congregation Administrator and an Elder?
areYouSureScheduleWithoutRequest: Are you sure you want to Schedule this Public Speaker without sending a Request?
atLeastOnePersonEditAccess: At least one person must have EDIT access to the Congregation and Persons at all times
attachmentTooLarge: Sorry, this file is too large. The file must be 2MB or less.
autoAssignNotEnoughPersonsAvailable: Please Note: Not all parts were auto-assigned as there were not enough available persons for the following:
averageTimeToCompleteATerritory: Average time to complete a territory
awayPeriodsApplyToAllFamilyMembers: This person is a Family Head. Would you like to apply their Away Periods to all family members?
awayPeriodsApplyToAllFamilyRequest: This person has requested to apply this Away Period to all family members.
backupIncludeMapFiles2: (This will make your Backup File much larger)
backupReminderMessage1: IMPORTANT: Please make a REGULAR OFFSITE BACKUP of your data!
backupReminderMessage2: NW Scheduler creates an Automatic Backup each time the program is closed. This is saved on your local computer only.
backupReminderMessage3: We STRONGLY RECOMMEND you also REGULARLY create an OFFSITE backup to a portable USB drive in case your computer crashes, is damaged, stolen, or if your data is damaged or corrupted.
backupReminderMessage4: Would you like to create an offsite backup now? (Please first insert a portable USB drive)
beforeImportPleaseBackup: Before importing, please create a Backup of your data!
believingFamilyMembersLivingWithYou: Believing family members living with you
betaCurrentlyUsing: You are currently using a Beta Version of NW Scheduler
betaGreatlyAppreciateMessage: We greatly appreciate all who lovingly make themselves available to become a Beta Tester!
betaPleaseTestMessage1: 1. Please *carefully read* the Overview, Important Information and Release Notes.
betaPleaseTestMessage2: 2. Please test all new and updated features.
betaPleaseTestMessage3: 3. Please click the Beta Verstion Testing button to send any problems, bugs, screenshots or other comments.
betaPleaseTestMessage4: Reminder: Only experienced users of NW Scheduler, who are good at problem solving and have carefully read Help should enable Beta Version Testing.
betaSendMultipleScreenshots: Important: Please attach multiple screenshots of any problems you have, as well as screenshots of each step you performed leading up to the problem, and what you see after the problem.
betaThankYouForSendingMessage: Thank you for sending any problems, bugs, screenshots or other comments
circuitOverseerNote: Note: First review the program just held, preview the next week’s program, make any necessary announcements, read any necessary letters, and then introduce the circuit overseer.
circuitOverseerVisitEndOnSunday: Circuit Overseer Visit must end on the Sunday of the same week
circuitOverseerVisitNotScheduled: Sorry, the Circuit Overseer Visit has not yet been scheduled. Please first Schedule the Circuit Overseer Visit.
circuitOverseerVisitRemoveExistingAssign: Would you like to also remove any existing Life and Ministry Meeting Auxiliary School, CSB Conductor, CBS Reader, Watchtower Reader and local Public Talk assignments for this week?
We recommend clicking Yes, otherwise you may cause scheduling problems.
circuitOverseerVisitStartOnTuesday: Circuit Overseer Visit must start on Tuesday
circuitStillHasApprovedCongregations: This Circuit still has other Approved Congregations.
clearExistingAssigmentsMessage: This Event Type will clear any existing Midweek or Weekend Assignments on this day/week
clearNonPioneerHoursExplanation: This will clear all Hours from all non-pioneer months for this person.
clmExplorerNotFound: CLM Explorer not found. Would you like to use a CLM Explorer Backup File instead? If yes, please use CLM Explorer to create a Local Backup (File > Backup), then click Yes to locate the Backup File.
clmScheduleCheckDraftExplanation: While in Draft mode, no changes to the schedule or assignments will be sent to NW Publisher app.
clmScheduleUncheckDraftExplanation: This schedule and any assignments can now be sent to the NW Publisher app.
coListScheduledFieldMinistry: List of those scheduled to work with CO and his Wife
completedMonthsSubmittedToBranch: Please first ensure all completed Field Service Reports have been marked as 'Submitted to Branch'. Only months that have been 'Submitted to Branch' will be included.
computerCannotOpenFile: Sorry, your computer cannot open this file type. Please open Windows Explorer and then open this file manually.
computerCannotOpenLink: Sorry, your computer cannot open this link. Please try setting a different Default Web browser.
confirmDeleteCongregationMessage: Are you sure you want to Delete this Congregation from your local computer?
congregationAnnouncementAttachmentNotExi: This Announcement contains an Attachment, but the Attachment cannot be found either on your local computer or on the server.
1) Click Congregation > Information Board > Announcements and Remove or re-Add the Attachment.
2) Click Congregation > Information Board > Announcements and Delete this Announcement.
congregationAppPINChanged: NW Publisher app Congregation PIN Changed
congregationDocumentAttachmentNotExistMe: This Document/Letter contains an Attachment, but the Attachment cannot be found either on your local computer or on the server.
1) Click Congregation > Information Board > Documents/Letters and Remove or re-Add the Attachment.
2) Click Congregation > Information Board > Documents/Letters and Delete this Document/Letter.
congregationFieldServiceReportNotYetSubm: This Congregation Field Service Report has not yet been marked as Submitted
congregationFieldServiceReportsNotYetSub: Congregation Field Service Reports not yet Submitted
congregationLanguageChangeReminder: Reminder: You should only change the Congregation Language ONCE, when you first create and setup your congregation.
congregationNotExist1: Congregation ID does not exist in this Region. Please carefully check your Region and Congregation ID, then try again.
congregationNotExist2: If you are still unable to connect, please ask a Congregation Administrator for assistance.
congregationNotExist3: If you are a Congregation Administrator, and no other Congregation Administrators have access, please Contact Us for assistance.
congregationRecentlyDeletedFromSharing1: This congregation was recently deleted from Sharing, and will need to be re-setup by a Congregation Administrator.
congregationSharedButRequestNotSent: This Congregation is Shared and you have selected a Public Speaker, but you have NOT sent any Requests
congregationSharingAllUsersSelectRegionM: After changing the Sharing Region, all Shared Persons will need to open NW Scheduler and select the new Region.
congregationSharingAppointedBrothers: NW Scheduler is designed for appointed brothers who handle congregation responsibilities only. Non-appointed brothers or sisters should only be added as a Shared Person if they handle a congregation responsibility.
congregationSharingBeforeEnablingPleaseC: Before enabling Congregration Sharing, please consent to and confirm the following:
congregationSharingConfirm: I have clicked Help > Congregation Sharing and understand how Congregation Sharing works, how to setup and how to solve any problems. I understand that Congregation Administrators are responsilbe for creating, editing and deleting all congregation and personal data, and that New World Solutions is unable to access, view, edit or transfer any of your personal or congregation data.
congregationSharingConfirmEUUKSimilar: I have visited the 'New World Scheduler compliance with EU GDPR, UK GDPR and other similar Data Protection Regulations' webpage, and I understand and consent to everything on that page, including my responsibilities. I understand that by enabling Congregation Sharing, the congregation takes the role of Data Controller and New World Solutions the Data Processor subject to the terms of our Privacy Policy and Data Processing Agreement.
congregationSharingCongregationInEuropea: This Congregation IS located in the European Union, UK, or places with similar Data Protection Regulations
congregationSharingCongregationNotInEuro: This Congregation is NOT located in the European Union, UK, or places with similar Data Protection Regulations
congregationSharingConnectMessage: If you do not know your Sharing Region, Congregation ID or Congregation Sharing Password, please ask a Congregation Administrator.
congregationSharingDataErrors: Sorry, your Congregation Sharing data has errors. Please try again. If this problem persists, please update to the latest version of NW Scheduler and then ask a Congregation Administrator to Re-Share with you. Click Help > Congregation Sharing for more information.
congregationSharingDataNotExist: Data does not exist on Sharing Server.
congregationSharingDataRemotelyDeletedMe: If you think this was an error, please speak to your local Congregation Administrator.
congregationSharingEnableExplanation1: Congregation Sharing allows you to automatically share and synchronize all NW Scheduler data with other appointed brothers in your congregation. This is separate to the NW Publisher app. Congregation Sharing does NOT store confidential information online.
congregationSharingEnableExplanation2: NW Scheduler Congregation Sharing is fully compliant with sfg, the EU GDPR, UK GDPR and other similar regulations.
congregationSharingExperiencedError: Sorry, your Congregation Sharing experienced an error
congregationSharingExperiencedErrorStep2: 2. Close NW Scheduler, then re-open and try again
congregationSharingExperiencedErrorStep3: 3. Check the Error Details below, and click Help > Congregation Sharing
congregationSharingHasProblem1: Your Congregation Sharing has a problem.
congregationSharingHasProblem22: We strongly recommend clicking Fix and fixing your Congregation Sharing.
congregationSharingHasProblemIgnoreMessa: Ignoring Sharing problems may cause data loss for yourself and others.
We strongly recommend Fixing the problem instead.
You should only ignore this problem if you have a very good reason (e.g. viewing data only) and understand exactly what you are doing.
congregationSharingIdentifyMessage: Your Email is used to Identify you. Please ensure a Congregation Administrator has already added you as a Shared Person using the following Email.
congregationSharingMoreThanThreePersonsC: Some data can be Edited by more than 3 people. We recommend only allowing 2-3 people to Edit each data type.
congregationSharingNewEncryptionMessage: Notice: A new data encryption method is now available. Please click Update Data.
congregationSharingNotFoundInRegionMessa: Your congregation was not found in this Region. A Congregation Administrator may have recently Changed Region or Deleted this congregation.
congregationSharingNotFoundInRegionOptio: 1. Ask a Congregation Administrator which Sharing Region you should select, and Connect again.
2. Wait for a Congregation Administrator to re-setup Congregation Sharing in this region, and then Connect again.
3. Click Disconnect, then double-check your Sharing Region, Congregation ID and Congregation Password is correct.
4. Re-setup Congregation Sharing in this region.
congregationSharingNotSetupInRegionOverr: I am a Congregation Administrator and this Region is correct
congregationSharingPasswordChangeMessage: Your Congregation Sharing Password is old or insecure. Please Change Password, then inform all Shared Persons.
congregationSharingPasswordChangeWarning: Please ensure all Shared Persons have CLOSED NW Scheduler before changing the password.
congregationSharingPasswordIncorrectMess: Congregation Sharing Password incorrect. Please try again or click Help > Congregation Sharing
congregationSharingPasswordMessage1: The password must be given to other brothers in your congregation so they can connect.
congregationSharingPasswordMessage2: The password must be 12 characters or longer, and include lowercase, uppercase and numbers.
congregationSharingPasswordMessage3: As this password is used to encrypt your data, we recommend choosing a secure password. The best passwords are long, unique phrases easy to remember.
congregationSharingPasswordMessage4: e.g. Congregation@NewYork2023 or PublicWitnessingIsGreat!543 or DeathWillBeNoMore21:34
congregationSharingPersonEmailNotMatch1: Sorry, Email Addresses do not match
congregationSharingPersonEmailNotMatch2: Please either change your Email or change the Person record 'Email 1'
congregationSharingPersonNotExist11: Sorry, this congregation does not have a Shared Person with the above Email.
congregationSharingPersonNotExist22: Please ensure that the above email exactly matches your NW Scheduler Shared Person record, or ask a Congregation Administrator to add you as a Shared Person.
congregationSharingPersonNotExist3: If you ARE a Congregation Administrator, you will need another Congregation Administrator to help you.
congregationSharingPersonUpdated1: A brother in your congregation has installed the latest NW Scheduler Major Update.
congregationSharingPleaseSeeHelp: Please see Help > Congregation Sharing for more information
congregationSharingPleaseSeeHelpSharingP: Please see Help > Congregation Sharing > Sharing Problems for more information
congregationSharingProblemHeading1a: Check Missing Data, Wrong Data or Syncing Problems
congregationSharingProblemHeading2Item1: Ensure all elders always promptly update to the latest version of NW Scheduler
congregationSharingProblemHeading2Item3: Only edit data when Congregation Sharing is Connected
congregationSharingProblemHeading2Item4: Ensure everyone is connected to the same Congregation ID and Sharing Region
congregationSharingProblemHeading2Item5: Do not edit the same type of data at the same time as another Shared Person
congregationSharingProblemHeading2Item6: Ensure all Shared Persons can successfully save data on their own computer
congregationSharingProblemHeading2Item7: Ensure all Shared Persons have the correct Computer Time set
congregationSharingProblemHeading3a: Fix Missing Data, Wrong Data or Syncing Problems
congregationSharingProblemHeading3SubIte: Refresh the specific data that is not syncing
congregationSharingRemotelyDeleteData: Also Remotely Delete all their NW Scheduler data
congregationSharingRemotelyDeleteDataWar: You should only choose this option in extreme circumstances, e.g. a person is deleted as an elder and disagrees with the decision.
congregationSharingRemovePersonMessage: This person will no longer be able to connect to Congregation Sharing
congregationSharingTimeIncorrectMessage: Your device time or timezone is not accurate. Please set your device time and timezone correctly before you connect to Congregation Sharing.
congregationSharingVerificationCodeReSen: A Verification Code has just been Resent to your Email. Please check your Email then enter the Verification Code.
congregationSharingVerificationCodeSent: A Verification Code has just been sent to your Email. Please check your Email then enter the Verification Code.
congregationSharingVerificationNotReceiv: If you don't receive the Verification Code soon, please try the following:
1. Check your SPAM or JUNK folders
2. Double-check your Email address is exactly correct
3. Wait 15 minutes, and then click Resend Verification Code. Sometimes email servers are busy.
4. Wait 24 hours and try again. Sometimes email servers are temporarily unavailable.
5. Create a new email account that will accept emails. We recommend Gmail.
connectionErrorLicenseMessage: Please try again or see License Help > Connection Problems
connectionErrorMessage1: NW Scheduler cannot connect to our servers
connectionErrorMessage2: Please click Reconnect and try again, or click Test Internet Connection, or see Connection Problems and Solutions.
connectToNWPublisherApp: Connect to the NW Publisher app
connectToNWPublisherAppMessage11: Please enter your NWP App Region and Congregation PIN to connect to the NW Publisher app.
connectToNWPublisherAppMessage33: If you do not know your Congregation PIN:
connectToNWPublisherAppMessage44: 1) Ask a Congregation Administrator. They can find the Congregation PIN under NWP App > NWP App Summary.
connectToNWPublisherAppMessage55: 2) Contact Us with your Region and Congregation ID, and we can reset your NWP App. This may result in all publishers having to reconnect.
contactInformationCheckNotYetReturned: Contact Information Check not yet returned
coordinatorOfTheBodyOfElders: Coordinator of the Body of Elders
copyNotesFromPublisherToNotes: Copy Notes from Publisher to Notes
createNewCongregationEnableRegistration: Please create a New Congregation to enable License
createNewCongregationMessage: If you are the first person in your congregation to use NW Scheduler, select New Congregation. Please do not choose New Congregation if another elder in your congregation is already using NW Scheduler.
createSampleCongregationMessage: This will create a randomly generated Sample Congregation and allow you to explore NW Scheduler with sample data. Later you can Delete the Sample Congregation and create your real congregation.
csvFileAlreadyOpen: CSV File already open. Please close before Importing.
dataEditedWhileNotConnected: Data was edited while NOT CONNECTED to Congregation Sharing, and could not be sent. Warning! This will likely cause sync problems or data errors!
dataWaitingSendToApp: There is data waiting to be sent to the NW Publisher app. We recommend you Send this data before closing NW Scheduler.
dateFirstStartedPreachingBeforeDateImmer: Date first started preaching must be before Date Immersed
defaultPrinterHasProblems: Sorry, Windows says that your Default Printer has problems or has been deleted. Please try adding a new Default Printer.
deleteAllFromAppMessage1: This will remove ALL upcoming data of this type from the App. You will then need to re-add to NW Scheduler and re-send to the App.
deleteAllFromAppMessage2: Data is automatically removed from the App after a period of time, so you should ONLY use this option if there are serious data errors in the App and they cannot be fixed inside NW Scheduler.
deleteAllPersonsSchedules: Would you like to also Delete all Persons and Schedules?
detailsHostShepherdingMeals: Details of Host, Shepherding visits and Meal Arrangements
deviceVerificationCodeIncorrect: Verification Code Incorrect. Please try again or click Resend Verification Code.
differentCongLangauge: (This may be different from your Congregation language)
disablePublicSpeakerSharingMessage: This will cause your congregation and public speakers to be removed from all Shared Congregations in your Circuit.
doYouWantToDownload: Do you want to download now?
editYourCongregationInCongregationInform: Edit your congregation in Congregation Information
emailLooksWrongMessage3: Would you like to fix your email address?
emailNotSetupMessage: Email not setup. Please click 'from', then setup and test your email. Click Help > Email > Setup Email for more information.
emailNotYetVerified: Email Address not yet verified. Please check your email and verify.
emailPleaseAddSubjectAndMessage: Please add a Subject and Message
emailTagSpecialFeatures: This Email Tag can only be used for reports supporting Email Special Features.
emergencyContactNotLinked: The Publisher has indicated this person is in this congregation, however they have not been linked.
enforceNWSMobilePINLockMessage: This will enforce Enable NWS Mobile PIN Lock for all appointed brothers. They will be required to set and use a PIN to access NWS Mobile.
enterPublicTalksMessage: Enter talk numbers, separated by comma
errorMessageCrash1: Sorry! NW Scheduler has experienced an error. Please try the following:
errorMessageCrash2: 1. Close and re-open NW Scheduler, then try again.
errorMessageCrash3: 2. Click Me > Updates > Check for Updates, then update NW Scheduler.
errorMessageCrash4: If you still experience this error, please do the following:
errorMessageCrash5: 1. Take a screenshot of this error, and screenshots of ALL steps you performed leading up to this error.
errorMessageCrash6: 2. Visit our website and click Help > Contact Us > Problem, then please describe what you were doing, and include all the screenshots.
errorReportCouldNotBeCreated: Sorry, this report could not be created.
estimatedTimeToCompleteTerritory: Estimated time to complete entire Territory
eventEndDateLaterTodayAndWithin60Days: End Date must be later than the Start Date, and within 60 days of the Start Date. No Event lasts more than 60 days.
everyoneWithAnyAssignmentsDuties: Everyone with any Assignments or Duties
existingCOVisitFieldServiceActivitiesWil: Any existing Circuit Overseer Visit Field Service Activities will be replaced.
existingFieldServiceScheduleWillBeReplac: The existing Field Service Schedule will be replaced.
existingPersonsFound: Existing Persons found. If you Open a Congregation from file, all previous Persons will be deleted.
exportPersonsMessage: You are about to export X Persons from your congregation.
familyAlreadyHasFamilyHead: This Family already has a Family Head
familyOnSameDay: Family member already has a part
familyOnSameDayAvoidScheduling: Avoid scheduling Family on same day
featureAvailableInCongregationGold: This feature is only available in Congregation Gold. Please see Me > License.
featureAvailableInCongregationSilverOrGo: This feature is only available in Congregation Silver or Congregation Gold. Please see Me > License.
featureExceeded1000Territories: Exceeded 1000 territories. Cannot add New Territory.
featureExceeded100Territories: Exceeded 100 territories. Cannot add New Territory. Please see Me > License.
featureExceeded150Persons: Exceeded 150 persons. Cannot add New Person. Please see Me > License.
featureExceeded250Persons: Exceeded 250 persons. Cannot add New Person. Please see Me > License.
featureExceeded350Persons: Exceeded 350 persons. Cannot add New Person.
featureExceeded500Territories: Exceeded 500 territories. Cannot add New Territory. Please see Me > License.
featureNotAvailableInIndividualVersion: Sorry, this feature is not available in the Individual version. Please see Me > License.
fieldServiceGroupsMissingOverseerAssista: Field Service Groups missing Overseer or Assistant
fileAlreadyExistsPleaseClose: File already exists and is open. Please either choose a different Filename or close the open file and try again.
fileCurrentlyOpenPleaseClose: File currently open, please close the file and try again.
fileNotValidCongregation: File is not a valid NW Scheduler Congregation
fileNotValidSharedPersonsBackup: File is not a valid NW Scheduler Shared Persons Backup
firstContactUsForInstructionsImportPerso: Please first Contact Us and ask for instructions to Import Persons from KHS.
firstContactUsForInstructionsImportPubli: Please first Contact Us and ask for instructions to Import Public Speakers from KHS.
firstCreateAndSelectTheCongregation: Please first create and select the Congregation
folderNotValidOrNoAccess: Folder is not valid or NW Scheduler has no access to this folder. Please Save to another folder.
futureMonthsToShowOnSchedule: Future Months to Show on Schedule
givePINToOthers: This PIN should then be given to publishers to allow them to connect using the NW Publisher app.
graphsCannotBeIncluded: Sorry, graphs can only be included if you select 15 people or less. Please either select less people, or untick 'Include Graphs'.
groupAlreadyHasAssistant: This group already has a Group Assistant
groupAlreadyHasOverseer: This group already has a Group Overseer
helpOfferPersonalHelpAgreeMessage1: I am a confident or expert NW Scheduler user, and I am willing to voluntarily assist brothers who request Help
helpOfferPersonalHelpAgreeMessage2a: I agree for my personal information to be stored in an encrypted database that can be searched by other brothers using NW Scheduler.
helpOfferPersonalHelpAgreeMessage3: I agree to voluntarily assist those who contact me for assistance.
helpOfferPersonalHelpAgreeMessage4: I will be patient and loving, and speak positively about NW Scheduler and NW Publisher app.
helpOfferPersonalHelpAppreciationMessage: We greatly appreciate the self-sacrificing love shown by those who volunteer to assist others.
helpOfferPersonalHelpCancelExplanation: All your Offer Personal Help information will be removed. You will no longer be voluntarily Offering Help.
helpOfferPersonalHelpConfidentExplanatio: 'Confident' means you are very familiar with this feature and regularly use this feature. You are also very familiar with what Help says about this feature.
helpOfferPersonalHelpExpertExplanation: 'Expert' means you fully understand more advanced parts of this feature (e.g. related Quick Steps, Me page alerts, email templates, etc). You also are very good at diagnosing or solving any problems with this feature.
helpOfferPersonalHelpExplanationMessage1: This is an arrangement where brothers can voluntarily offer to help those who need personal assistance with NW Scheduler or NW Publisher app.
helpOfferPersonalHelpExplanationMessage2: If you agree, your name and contact details will be added to a database that can be searched by brothers in your area who need assistance.
helpOfferPersonalHelpIncludeEmailOrPhone: Please include either Email or a Phone number
helpOfferPersonalHelpRequirementMessage1: Sorry, you must have a valid congregation to offer help
helpOfferPersonalHelpRequirementMessage2: Please first identify yourself on the Me view to offer help
helpOfferPersonalHelpRequirementMessage3: Sorry, you must have a current License to offer Help
helpOfferPersonalHelpRequirementMessage4: Please select at least one language
helpOfferPersonalHelpStatus1CurrentlyOff: You are currently voluntarily Offering Help.
helpOfferPersonalHelpStatus2ExpireSoon: Your Offering Help will soon expire. Please check your information and click Update.
helpOfferPersonalHelpStatus3Expired: Your Offering Help has expired. Please check your information and click Update.
helpRequestPersonalHelpAgreeMessage1: This brother is a volunteer who is displaying self-sacrificing love to assist others. Please be loving and kind when requesting Help. Please do not expect immediate help, but rather arrange a suitable time.
helpRequestPersonalHelpExplanationMessag: This is an arrangement where you can request help from brothers who have volunteered to help those who need personal assistance with NW Scheduler or NW Publisher app.
Please show reasonableness and kindness when requesting personal Help from volunteers.
helpUpdatingChristianLifeAndMinistryMeet: Help > Updating Christian Life and Ministry Meeting Schedule
howDoesNWPublisherAppWork: How does the NW Publisher app work?
identifyNotInList: If you are not in the list below, please double-check your Sharing Region is correct. Otherwise, please contact a Congregation Administrator and ask them to add you to the Shared Persons List.
ifAnyQuestionsProblemsPleaseClickHelp: If you have any Questions or Problems, please click Help
ifRequireAssistanceClickHelp: If you have any questions or require assistance with any new features or updates, please click Help
importCompletedCarefullyCheckSaveImportL: Import Completed. Please carefully check and Save the Import Log below.
importCongregationFromCLMExplorer: If you are the first person in your congregation to use NW Scheduler and you currently use CLM Explorer, you can import your CLM Explorer data into NW Scheduler.
importCongregationFromCSVFile: If you are the first person in your congregation to use NW Scheduler and you have person data saved in CSV File format, you can import your CSV data into NW Scheduler.
importCongregationFromDeckhand: If you are the first person in your congregation to use NW Scheduler and you currently use Deckhand, you can import your Deckhand data into NW Scheduler.
importCongregationFromHourglass: If you are the first person in your congregation to use NW Scheduler and you currently use Hourglass, you can import your Hourglass data into NW Scheduler.
importCongregationFromKHS: If you are the first person in your congregation to use NW Scheduler and you currently use Majestic KHS, you can import your KHS data into NW Scheduler.
importCongregationFromTSWin: If you are the first person in your congregation to use NW Scheduler and you currently use TSWin, you can import your TSWin data into NW Scheduler.
importDataWillOverwriteExisting: Imported data will overwrite any existing data.
importingCongregationOverwriteExisting: Importing a Congregation will overwrite all existing Congregation data.
importingKHSAnotherCongregationsData: You are importing Public Speakers from another congregation who uses KHS.
importingKHSCongregationAppEnabled1: You have ticked 'Congregation' but the NW Publisher app is currently enabled.
importingKHSCongregationAppEnabled2: You must either first Disable the App, or Untick 'Congregation'.
importingKHSCongregationSharingEnabled1: You have ticked 'Congregation' but Congregation Sharing is currently enabled.
importingKHSCongregationSharingEnabled2: You must either first Disable Sharing, or Untick 'Congregation'
importingKHSCongregationSharingOrAppEnab: You cannot import a Congregation from KHS if either Congregation Sharing or the NW Publisher app is enabled. This would cause major problems.
importingKHSOwnData: You are importing your own KHS data.
importIntoNWSchedulerStep1: 1. Select your exported KHS data file (on the Desktop)
importIntoNWSchedulerStep2: 2. Choose the data you wish to Import
importMeetingWorkbookDateInvalid: EPUB filename Date invalid. Should be 'mwb_E_202207.epub' or similar.
importMeetingWorkbookDateWrong: EPUB file does not contain Meeting Data for the selected week. Please check your EPUB file or choose another week.
importMeetingWorkbookEnglishNotExist: The English Meeting data does not exist for this week. Please first wait for English to be available.
importMeetingWorkbookFilenameIncorrect: EPUB filename is incorrect. Should be 'mwb_E_202207.epub' or similar.
importMeetingWorkbookNotMatchLanguage: This EPUB Meeting Workbook does not match the selected Language.
importNamesMatchCLMAssignmentAdded: If both the First Name and Last Name *exactly match* any existing person, the CLM assignments will be added. Otherwise a warning will be shown.
importNamesMatchDutyAdded: If both the First Name and Last Name *exactly match* any existing person, the Duty will be added. Otherwise a warning will be shown.
importNamesMatchPersonMerged: If both the First Name and Last Name match *exactly* for any existing persons, the existing person data will merged. Otherwise a new person will be created.
importPersonsMessage: You are about to import X Persons from your congregation.
importTerritoriesFromCSVMessage: Do NOT choose this option if you are importing from Territory Helper, Hourglass, Alba, Territory Assistant, OTM or Multi-Terr. Instead, please carefully re-read the instructions.
importTerritoryAddressesMessage1: You have selected a Territory. All addresses will be imported into this selected Territory.
importTerritoryAddressesMessage2: To import into multiple territories, please click Congregation > Import or Export > Import
importTerritoryAddressesTooManyMessage1: You are attempting to import a very large number of Territory Addresses, which will take a very long time.
importTerritoryAddressesTooManyMessage2: We recommend instead splitting the import file into smaller batches of 5000 addresses, then importing one file at a time.
individualLicenseCongregationSharingEnab: You have an Individual License, but Congregation Sharing is enabled. Congregation Sharing requires a Congregation License.
informationBoardMessage1: The Information Board should only be used for Announcements, Letters and Documents that would normally appear on your Kingdom Hall Information Board, or that are read aloud during the meeting.
informationBoardMessage2: All Announcements, Letters and Documents should be approved by the COBE (see sfg 13:14).
informationBoardMessage3: NW Scheduler is not a messaging application. Please do not use the Information Board to send messages or notifications to publishers.
invalidEmail: Invalid Email Address. Please try again.
joinedMaximumCircuits: Sorry, you have already joined the maximum amount of Circuits.
label: Label
lateReportExplanation: Tick only if this months Congregation Field Service Report has already been submitted to the Branch. This report will be added to next months totals.
lifeAndMinistryMeetingNotScheduled: Life and Ministry Meeting not scheduled
limitedFinancialMeansConfirmCountry: I confirm the Country of Congregation is correct
limitedFinancialMeansConfirmQualify: I qualify for Limited Financial Means License
limitedFinancialMeansExplanation11: We recognise that some dear friends have limited financial means and live in poor countries. Therefore, we have an option called Limited Financial Means License that helps these friends register and benefit from NW Scheduler.
limitedFinancialMeansMightQualify: You might qualify for Limited Financial Means Pricing
limitedFinancialMeansWhoQualifies: Limited Financial Means License is available to those who live in poor countries, have limited financial means, and are unable to afford the standard License.
literatureRequestsWaitingToBeDelivered: Literature Requests waiting to be delivered
literatureRequestsWaitingToBeOrdered: Literature Requests waiting to be ordered
localAttachmentNotOpenMessage1: Cannot upload attachment - Unable to access the Attachment.
localAttachmentNotOpenMessage2: Please CLOSE all attachments before sending! Otherwise, please remove and re-Add the Attachment, and try again.
localNeedCurrentlyScheduledMessage1: This local need is currently Scheduled.
majorProblemsPleaseReplyOrContactUs: If there are major problems, please reply to our Import Instructions email, or Contact Us. You MUST please include the Import Log when replying or contacting us.
mapCacheEnabledMessage: We strongly recommend enabling the Map Cache.
mapDownloadFailedMessage: Map Download Failed. Please check your internet connecting and try again. If the problem persists, you will need to Remove then Re-Add the map.
mapFileTooBig: Sorry, this file is too big. Maps must be 300KB or less.
maximumDelegatesMessage: Sorry, this person already has 5 delegates.
meetingAttendanceValueEmpty: A meeting was held, but some cells are blank. Please enter attendance (or 0) for all weeks that a meeting was held.
minimumTimeBetweenCLMNonSchoolParts: Minimum time between CLM Non-School Parts
minimumTimeBetweenCLMSchoolParts: Minimum time between CLM School Parts
moreInformationPleaseVisitDownload: For more information, please visit NWScheduler.com > Download
moveChangeDeleteCongregation: Move, Change, Merge, Split or Delete Congregation
name: Name
noAppointedBrothersWithEmail: Sorry, no appointed brothers with an Email Address have been added to NW Scheduler. This is required to Enable Sharing.
noCongregationFieldServiceReportsSubmitt: There are no Congregation Field Service Reports marked as 'Submitted to Branch' in this period. Please click 'Submitted to Branch' for all Congregation Field Service Reports in this period.
noCountrySelectedMessage: No Country selected. Please first click 'Congregation > Congregation Information' and select your country.
noGroupsMessage: This report requires Groups, but you have not created any. Please click Congregation > Groups to add and assign persons to groups.
noInformationToPrintCheckEvents: No Information to Print. Check your Congregation Events.
noLiteratureRequestsWaitingToBeDelivered: No Literature Requests waiting to be delivered
noLiteratureRequestsWaitingToBeOrdered: No Literature Requests waiting to be ordered
noOutlines: No Outlines. Please enter outlines at Persons > Assign > Away Public Speaker
noPersonsSelected: No Persons selected. Please click Persons > select the persons you want to Export > click Export Persons.
noPublicSpeakerEmailMessage: Please click Congregation > Neighbor Congregations and Public Speakers to add the Public Speaker.
noPublicTalkCoordinatorFound: No Public Talk Coordinator email found.
noPublicTalkCoordinatorFoundMessage: Please click Congregation > Neighbor Congregations and Public Speakers to add the Public Talk Coordinator.
noSaveButton: Tip: There is no save button. Everything saves automatically!
notCompletedLast12Months: Not completed in the last 12 months
notCompletedLast6Months: Not completed in the last 6 months
notEnoughMemoryError: Not enough memory to Save. Please select less data to save at once, or untick 'Combine'.
noTerritoryAddressNotesFromPublishers: No Territory Address Notes from Publishers
notSendIndividually: You have chosen to NOT Send Individually. All information will be sent in one file.
notWorkedLast12Months: Not worked in the last 12 months
notWorkedLast6Months: Not worked in the last 6 months
nwpAppPersonsWithOldVersion: NWP App Persons with Old Version
nwPublisherAppExplanation1: NW Publisher is a free app that can be installed on Apple iOS, Google Android and Amazon devices, allowing publishers to see upcoming Schedules, Assignments, Duties, Congregation Events and Announcements, submit Field Service Reports and more.
nwPublisherAppExplanation2: Data for the NW Publisher app comes to and from your local NW Scheduler congregation only.
nwPublisherAppExplanation3: Before enabling, please click Help > NW Publisher app and ensure you understand how the App works, how to setup and how to solve any problems.
nwPublisherAppExplanation4: We are unable to offer individual support for publishers.
nwSchedulerComplianceWithGDPR1: NW Scheduler compliance with EU GDPR, UK GDPR and other similar Data Protection Regulations
nwsMobileEnableMessage1: This will allow all appointed brothers to use NWS Mobile to connect to your congregation.
nwsMobileEnableMessage2: Warning: NWS Mobile is currently BETA TESTING. This means problems or bugs are more likely, including data loss. Please only enable NWS Mobile if your congregation elders are willing to participate in BETA testing, are willing and able to report problems, and know how to restore data from Backup in case of data loss.
nwsMobileNewSharingRegionMessage: NWS Mobile is only available on the new Sharing Regions. When you are ready, click Change Region to change to one of the new Regions. We recommend first carefully reading Help > Congregation Sharing Overview > Sharing Regions
onlyCongregationAdministratorsCanChangeT: Sorry, only Congregation Administrators can change this.
onlyCongregationAdministratorsDoThis: Only Congregation Administrators should do this!
onlyDelete50Territories: Sorry, you can only delete up to 50 territories at a time.
onlyEldersCanEnableCongregationSharing: Warning: Only Elders can Enable Congregation Sharing.
onlyOneCongregationAdministrator: Your congregation only has 1 Congregation Administrator. We strongly recommend you have at least 2 Congregation Administrators.
openCongregationFromAutomaticBackupMessa: Every time NW Scheduler closes it creates an Automatic Backup on your local computer. If you have already used NW Scheduler on this computer, you can open this Congregation from Automatic Backup.
openCongregationFromFileMessage: If you or another elder has already created a NW Scheduler Congregation and then created a Backup File, you can open this Congregation from Backup File
openCongregationFromSharingMessage: If you or another elder has already created a NW Scheduler Congregation and then Enabled Congregation Sharing, you can open this Congregation from Sharing.
openNow: Would you like to Open now?
outOfMemoryErrorMessage1: Your computer has run out of memory while drawing the Territory boundary. Please try again.
outOfMemoryErrorMessageOption1: Option 1: Use a 64-bit Windows Operating System (Recommended)
outOfMemoryErrorMessageOption2: Option 2: Allocate more Virtual Memory to NW Scheduler
outOfMemoryErrorMessageOption3: Option 3: Before drawing any new Territory Boundaries, first reduce your NW Scheduler screen size
outOfMemoryErrorMessageOptions: If you still have this problem, there are 3 ways to fix:
overwriteAllSelectedDuties: This will overwrite all Selected Duties from the current Selected Date onwards
overwriteAllSelectedParts: This will overwrite all Selected Parts and clear any future Selected Parts assignments
passwordNotValid2: Password must be 12 characters or more, and include lowercase, uppercase and numbers.
passwordProtectMessage: This means every time you open NW Scheduler you must enter your NW Scheduler password. If you forget your NW Scheduler password, you may not be able to open NW Scheduler.
passwordResetMessage: Your password has been reset. A new password will be sent to your Password Recovery Email in a few minutes. Please also check your SPAM or JUNK folders.
patientlyWaitUntilMeetingWorkbookDataAva: Patiently wait until the Meeting Workbook data is available
pdfViewerMustBeInstalledToPreview: PDF Viewer must be installed to Preview reports. Please Google 'How to install PDF viewer' or ask a local friend for assistance.
permanentlyRemoveDataFromSharingServer: This will immediately and permanently remove all encrypted data from the Sharing Server. This will affect all Shared Persons.
personAlreadyHasAssignmentThisWeekend: Person already has an assignment this weekend.
personAlreadyPartOfFamily: Person is already part of a Family. Please first set the family to None.
personHasCurrentTerritoryAssignments: This person has current Territory Assignments. Please first remove or Complete these territory assignments.
personHasFuturePublicTalks: This person has future Public Talks. Please first click 'Information > History' and remove these assignments.
personHasPartsWhileAway: This person has parts while they are away.
personNotAssignedGroup: Person not assigned to a Field Service Group
personSetRemoved: This will remove all their future Assignments and Duties, and disable their App access.
personsNotAssignedGroup: Persons not assigned to a Field Service Group
pleaseCarefullyCheckAndConfirm: Please carefully check and confirm this information. Is this correct?
pleaseChangeCircuitInPublicSpeakerSharin: Sorry, please change your Circuit in Public Speaker Sharing.
pleaseCheckInformationMessage: Please check all information and adjust as necessary. Afterwards, return to your Group Overseer.
pleaseCreateCongregationSharingPassword: Please create a Congregation Sharing Password
pleaseDoNotForgetPassword: Please do not forget this password!
pleaseDoNotUsejwpubEmail: Invalid Email. Please do not use your jwpub email address.
pleaseEditLocalPublicTalksUsingPublicTal: Please edit Local Public Talks using Public Talks - Local
pleaseEnterValidEmail: Please enter at least one valid email address
pleaseFirstSeeHelpSetupYourOwnSMTPServer: Please first see Help > Setup your own SMTP Server
pleaseFirstUpdateAndCloseKHS: Please first Update KHS to the latest version, and then close KHS.
pleaseSaveImportLog: Please save and check the Import Log for detailed information.
pleaseSeeHelpPersonalHelp: Please see Help > Personal Help for more information
pleaseSyncAppReservations: Please first Sync App Reservations before making changes to reservations or disabling locations.
pleaseTryAgain: Please check your Internet connection and try again. If the problem persists, please click Help.
pleaseUpdateNWSchedulerMessage1: To continue using Congregation Sharing, please install this Major Update by clicking Me > Updates. WARNING: Until you update, any changes you make might not be Shared. Please update as soon as possible.
pleaseUseAutoAssignResponsibily: Please use Auto-Assign responsibly and double-check each Part is assigned to the most suitable person.
pleaseValidateEmail: A Verification Email has been sent to your email address. Please verify your email and then Login.
prepareMonthlyMovementOfLiteratureForms: Prepare Monthly Movement of Literature (S-28) forms
prepareVarietyOfTerritories: Prepare a variety of territories that can be used
previous12MonthsNotSubmitted: The previous 12-months Congregation Field Service Reports have not been 'Submitted', so this report might not work correctly. See Help > Congregation Field Service Report for more information.
previousMonthsToShowOnSchedule: Previous Months to Show on Schedule
printingAccess: Please Note: Printing Access is automatically based on the above.
problemsUpdatingMessage: If you have ANY problems updating, please see Help > Updating NW Scheduler.
problemsWithTranslation: If you notice any problems with the translation, please click
programInactivityMessage1: Please do not leave NW Scheduler open when you are not using it, as this may cause data sync problems.
programInactivityMessage2: Instead, only open NW Scheduler when you need to use it, and then please close it when you have finished.
programInactivityMessage3: NW Scheduler will automatically Save and Close in
programOpenTooLongMessage1a: NW Scheduler has been open for over 1 hour
programOpenTooLongMessage2a: This may have been caused by closing your laptop lid, or sleeping your computer, while NW Scheduler was still open. Please do not do this.
programOpenTooLongMessage3a: NW Scheduler must be properly closed and opened for data to sync correctly, especially if you are using the NW Publisher app or Congregation Sharing.
programOpenTooLongMessage4a: We *strongly recommend* closing NW Scheduler now. If you need to keep using NW Scheduler, simply re-open.
publicSpeakerHasUpcomingLocalPublicTalks: This Public Speaker has upcoming Local Public Talks in your congregation. Please first remove these assignments.
publicSpeakerSharingAddRequestedSpeakers: Please first add some Requested Speakers and Requested Dates.
publicSpeakerSharingAlreadyExists: This Circuit already exists. Please try joining the Circuit.
publicSpeakerSharingAlreadyScheduledPubl: You have already scheduled a Public Talk for this weekend. Creating a New Request will remove the existing Public Talk.
publicSpeakerSharingApprovedRequests: Approved Requests will be added to your Away Public Talk Schedule.
publicSpeakerSharingApprovedRequestsNeed: All Approved Requests must have an Outline.
publicSpeakerSharingApproveMessage1: Do you recognize and trust this Congregation?
publicSpeakerSharingApproveMessage2: Is this congregation either in this circuit, or physically nearby?
publicSpeakerSharingCancelledRequests: Cancelled Requests will be removed from your Away Public Talk Schedule.
publicSpeakerSharingCancellingApprovedIn: Cancelling an Approved Speaker will remove the Local Public Talk Assignment and notify the other congregation.
publicSpeakerSharingCancellingApprovedOu: Cancelling an Approved Speaker will remove the Away Public Talk Assignment and notify the other congregation.
publicSpeakerSharingCannotSwap: Sorry, you cannot swap a talk scheduled with Public Speaker Sharing.
publicSpeakerSharingChangesMadeNotSent: You made changes but did not Send or Update the Request.
publicSpeakerSharingCircuitMissing: Please first create your Circuit (see Congregation > Circuits, Congregations and Speakers)
publicSpeakerSharingCircuitNameFormat: Your circuit name should be in the following format
publicSpeakerSharingCircuitNameFormatLan: If you are a Foreign Language circuit, you may add the Language Code
publicSpeakerSharingCircuitNameNotValid: Your circuit name is not valid.
publicSpeakerSharingConfirmCircuitName2: Please carefully check your Circuit Name MATCHES the Circuit Name given by your local branch. This can be found on jw.org.
publicSpeakerSharingConfirmCircuitName3: Please DO NOT include any A,B,C divisions.
publicSpeakerSharingConfirmDisable: Do you still want to Disable Sharing?
publicSpeakerSharingConfirmOrCancelReque: Please first Confirm or Cancel all Approved Requests.
publicSpeakerSharingCongregationNoLonger: This congregation is no longer shared. Setting to "Not Shared"
publicSpeakerSharingCongregationRequeste: Congregation Requested their data be Remotely Deleted
publicSpeakerSharingCongregationUnableTo: Unable to Deny Congregation because this congregation is already Approved and may have outstanding Requests.
If you feel this congregation should be Denied or Removed, please Contact Us and include the Circuit ID, Congregation ID and an explanation.
publicSpeakerSharingContactByPhoneMessag: (Perhaps you can contact them via phone or message to confirm they made this request)
publicSpeakerSharingDeleteCircuitInstead: You are the only Approved Congregation in this Circuit. Please Delete the circuit instead.
publicSpeakerSharingEnabledMessage: Public Speaker Sharing is Enabled. Changing your Circuit might cause problems for Public Speaker Sharing.
publicSpeakerSharingExplanation1: Public Speaker Sharing allows you to share your local Public Speaker information with nearby congregations, as well as Send and Receive Requests for Public Speakers directly from within NW Scheduler.
publicSpeakerSharingExplanation2: Public Speaker Sharing is self-managed by all congregations within a circuit.
publicSpeakerSharingExplanation3: Before enabling, please click Help > Public Speaker Sharing to ensure you understand how Public Speaker Sharing works, how to setup and how to solve any problems.
publicSpeakerSharingFirstAssignCOBEAndPT: Please first assign the COBE and Public Talk Coordinator. (See Congregation > Congregation Responsibilities)
publicSpeakerSharingFirstEnterCOBEAndPTC: Please first enter your COBE and Public Talk Coordinator contact details. (See Person Information)
publicSpeakerSharingJoinCircuitAsGuestNo: Sorry, you may not join another circuit as a Guest unless you have first created your OWN circuit and specifed the Circuit Name.
publicSpeakerSharingJoinCircuitExplanati: Each congregation may join their Primary Circuit, and up to 5 other Circuits as Guests.
publicSpeakerSharingJoinCircuitReminder1: Reminder: You should only join a Circuit that your congregation is in, or is PHYSICALLY NEAR (such as neighboring circuits).
publicSpeakerSharingJoinCircuitReminder2: Please DO NOT join circuits that you are not in, or that are far away.
publicSpeakerSharingNoDataAvailable: No data available. Congregation has not connected recently or is using an old version of NW Scheduler.
publicSpeakerSharingNotApproved: Sorry, you were Not Approved to join this circuit. Your congregation must be either in this circuit, or physically nearby.
publicSpeakerSharingNotApprovedAnyReques: You have not approved any of their Public Speaker Requests.
publicSpeakerSharingNotJoined: Sorry, you have not joined the Circuit. Please Join Circuit to see Congregation Information.
publicSpeakerSharingNotYetApproved: Sorry, you are not yet Approved. To see Congregation Information, you must first be Approved by one of the congregations in the circuit.
publicSpeakerSharingOnlyOneRequestedSpea: You have only requested ONE speaker for ONE date.

It is unlikely the other congregation will be able to approve your request. We strongly recommend requesting MULTIPLE speakers for MULTIPLE dates. This allows the other congregation flexibility in approving your requests.
publicSpeakerSharingOutlineAlreadyApprov: This outline was already approved and sent. If you change the outline, please inform the other congregation and public speaker.
publicSpeakerSharingRecommendFirstLeaveA: We highly recommend you please first LEAVE all Shared Circuits before Disabling Sharing.
publicSpeakerSharingRemotelyDeleteData: Do you want your Public Speaker data to be remotely deleted from Neighbor Congregations who are currently sharing with you?
publicSpeakerSharingRemotelyDeleteRecomm: (We recommend selecting No, otherwise you might cause problems with any congregations you have Requests with.)
publicSpeakerSharingRequestInPast: Sorry, you cannot create Public Speaker Sharing Requests in the past.
publicSpeakerSharingRequestPermanentlyCa: This request has already been sent and will now be permanently cancelled. All Public Talks related to this request will be removed.
publicSpeakerSharingStillHaveRequests: You still have Requests for this Circuit. You shoud first CANCEL or DENY all requests before leaving.
publicSpeakerSharingUnscheduledDates: Sorry, only unscheduled dates can be added.
publicSpeakersInCongregationHaveUpcoming: Some Public Speakers in this congregation have upcoming Local Public Talks in your congregation. Please first remove these assignments.
publicSpeakerUnavailable: This Public Speaker is Not Available on this date.
publicWitnessingNotKeyPerson: Sorry, this person is not a Key Person.
publicWitnessingReservationsWaitingToSen: Public Witnessing Reservations waiting to send. Please first Send App Data before syncing.
publisherInformedEmergencyContactMessage: Publisher has informed their emergency contact that this information will be shared with the congregation elders, who may contact him in an emergency, and that any personal information is handled according to the Privacy Policy
publisherReportsEditAllGroupsMessage: We strongly recommend ONLY the Secretary has Edit access to All Groups
publishersStatusUpdated: The following publishers will have their Active and Regular status updated:
pullDataMessage1: This will overwrite your current LOCAL data and replace it with the SHARED data.
pullDataMessage2: Please Note: You should NOT do this often, but only if your LOCAL data is missing or corrupted. If this happens regularly, please click Help.
pullPushDataMessage: Before doing this, please carefully check the following Help pages:
pushDataLogMessage: PUSHING DATA! Everyone's LOCAL data will be removed and replaced with this persons data.
pushDataMessage1: This will overwrite the SHARED data and replace it with your current LOCAL data.
pushDataMessage2: Please Note: You should NOT do this often, but only if the SHARED data is missing or corrupted. If this happens regularly, please click Help.

quickStepSendAppInvitationEmailToNotConn: Send App Invitation Email to Not Connected App Persons

quickStepSendCongregationFieldServiceSum: Send Congregation Field Service Summary to all elders
quickStepSendEmailToAppPersonsWithOldVer: Send Email to App Persons with Old Version

quickStepSendFieldServiceGroupReportNotR: Send Field Service Group Report not received Reminders
quickStepSendGroupEmergencyContactListTo: Send Group Emergency Contact List to Group Overseers
quickStepSendGroupFieldServiceSummaryToG: Send Group Field Service Summary to Group Overseers

quickStepSendLifeAndMinistryMeetingAssig: Send Life and Ministry Meeting Assignment Reminders
quickStepSendMissingInformationOrEmergen: Send Missing Information or Emergency Contacts to Group Overseers

quickStepSendPublishersFieldServiceGroup: Send Publishers their Field Service Group
quickStepSendPublishersReportNotReceived: Send Publishers Report not received Reminders
quickStepSendSchoolWorksheetsToChairmenA: Send School Worksheets to chairmen and auxiliary counselors

quickStepSendUpcomingPublicTalkAssignmen: Send Upcoming Public Talk Assignments to appointed brothers
quickStepSendVisitingSpeakerInvitationsT: Send Visiting Speaker Invitations to Public Talk Coordinators
quickStepSendWeeklyOverviewToAppointedBr: Send Weekly Overview to appointed brothers
receiveBetaVersionUpdatesMessage1: Beta Version updates are released about a week before standard updates, and allow you to test new features and updates before they are released. Beta Releases are more likely to contain bugs or small problems. We appreciate your help in reporting these bugs and making suggestions on new features.
receiveBetaVersionUpdatesMessage2: Please Note: Since Congregation Sharing has been enabled, you should only chose to receive Beta Version updates if all other Shared Persons are also happy to do this, since Congregation Sharing requires all brothers to be using the same version of NW Scheduler.
reducePDFSizeMessage1: To reduce your PDF file size:
reducePDFSizeMessage3: 2) Re-save with a lower quality setting
reducePDFSizeMessage4: 3) Visit https://smallpdf.com/compress-pdf and compress the PDF
refreshMasterMapMessage: To Refresh the Master Map Boundaries, please leave the Territories window, then return to the Territories window
refreshRequestsMessage: This will also reset the Status of your Requests, and may require you to Re-Approve, Re-Confirm or Re-Cancel requests.
registrationCardSurchangeMessage1: 'AUD Australian Dollar' payments have no surcharge. Other currencies incur a Card Surcharge of up to 3.9% + $0.30
registrationConfirmationAgreePolicies1: The above information is correct. I have also read and agree to the Privacy Policy, License Agreement and Refund Policy
registrationConfirmationCarefullyCheck: Please carefully check all of the above is correct, especially your Email.
registrationConfirmationPaymentOpenInWeb: The payment page will open in your web browser
registrationConfirmationPleaseEnterFollo: Please enter your Congregation ID and Email EXACTLY AS BELOW when making payment
Please enter your Email EXACTLY AS BELOW when making payment
licenseExpiredViewOnly: License Expired VIEW only.  Please click Me > License.
registrationExtraFeaturesCongregationSil: Includes Public Witnessing, Language Groups, Literature Requests, Maintenance
licenseKeyCorrupted: License Key is corrupted. Please click Refresh.
selectPaymentMethodAndCurrency: Please select Payment Method and Currency
reminderPleaseUpdateMessage2: Reminder: Please update within the next few days. Old versions are not supported and may cause problems.
reminderSendPersonAppData: Reminder: The NW Publisher app and Show Field Service History are enabled. After Submitting, please click App > Send App Data > then Prepare and Send any Person data.
renewAvailableWithinXDaysExpiry: Renew available within X days of Expiry Date
resetCongregationFromSharingMessage: Please Note: If no other elders have access, please Contact Us with your Congregation ID and we can reset your Congregation Sharing.
resetCongregationSharingMessage: If you are the ONLY Congregation Administrator and do not have another device connected, you will need to Reset Congregation Sharing.
restoreCongregationOverwriteExisting: Restoring a Congregation will overwrite all existing Congregation data.
restoreDataOverwriteExisting: Restoring data will overwrite any existing data of the selected Data Types.
restoreSharedCongregationMessage: This Congregation is currently Shared. Would you like this Restored Congregation to replace the current Shared Congregation?
restoreSuccessful: Your data has been successfully restored!
review: Review Followed by Preview of Next Week
s13Note: When beginning a new sheet, use this column to record the date on which each territory was last completed.
s89NoteToStudentText2024: The source material and study point for your assignment can be found in the Life and Ministry Meeting Workbook. Please review the instructions for the part as outlined in Instructions for Our Christian Life and Ministry Meeting (S-38).
seeTerritoriesSettings1: See 'Territories > Settings' for all Territory App Settings
sendAndReceiveNWPAppData: Send and Receive NWP App Data
sendFromGmail3LoginWithYourGmailAccount: 3. Sign in to your Google account
sendFromGmail4AllowNWSchedulerToSendEmai: 4. Allow NW Scheduler to Send Emails
seriousErrorLoading: Sorry! NW Scheduler experienced a serious error while loading. This usually means your installation is corrupt.
sharedDataNotFoundSyncBy: Shared Data not found. Initial Sync by
sharedPersonEditEmailMessage: This person is a Shared Person. Changing their Email may prevent them from accessing Congregation Sharing.
sharedPersonInvalidEmail: Sorry, this person does not have a valid 'Email 1' added in NW Scheduler. This is required so they can correctly Identify with Congregation Sharing.
sharingDisablePublisherReportsMessage1: This will remove all encrypted Publisher Report data from the Sharing Server and prevent any future sharing or synchronizing of Publisher Reports.
sharingDisablePublisherReportsMessage2: If you later re-enabled this, Publisher Reports may not be synchronized correctly.
sharingDisablePublisherReportsMessage3: We strongly recommend AGAINST doing this unless specifically directed by your local Branch.
showContactDetailsOnCLMAssignmentSlips: Show Contact Details on CLM Assignment Slips
someCongregationFieldServiceReportsNotSu: Some Congregation Field Service Reports in this period have NOT been marked as 'Submitted to Branch'. For accurate results, please click 'Submitted to Branch' for all Congregation Field Service Reports in this period.
speaker: Speaker
subject: Subject
submitOldCongregationFieldServiceReport1: You are attempting to set an old Congregation Field Service Report as 'Submitted to Branch'. This will cause all publishers Active, Inactive and Irregular status to be updated as at the time of this old Field Service Report. We strongly recommend setting older Congregation Field Service Reports as 'Submitted to Branch' in reverse date order, ending with the most recent month.
